author: Bellular News
description:
Play War Thunder now and get a massive, free bonus pack including vehicles, boosters and more! PC/Console: https://playwt.link/bellularwarcraft | Mobile: https://wtm.game/bellularwarcraft Sponsored by War Thunder.

EA prioritized low-end PC performance from day one of Battlefield 6's development, ditching ray-tracing entirely and testing on below-spec hardware - a complete reversal from BF5's graphics-first approach. Why EA's flagship shooter is targeting 5-year-old graphics cards when they desperately need 100 million players to make this gamble pay off.

Join us at http://bellular.games for early access content, 20 editions of 'Loading Screen' a month and to support our team!
